Today in Pembrokeshire, it's looking solid with 6 ft @10s WSW swell and a light 11 mph S wind. Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay are your best bets, especially during the mid-tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @10s SW with light 2 mph SE winds, making for a quieter day. On the day after, conditions improve slightly to 4 ft @8s WSW with a gentle 7 mph S breeze, offering some fun waves. Best: today.
